typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		fecha_hoy_casos as string,
		Caso as string,
		{Fecha Not} as string,
		Departamento as string,
		Departamento_nom as string,
		Ciudad_municipio as string,
		Ciudad_municipio_nom as string,
		Edad as string,
		unidad_medida as string,
		Sexo as string,
		Fuente_tipo_contagio as string,
		Ubicacion as string,
		Estado as string,
		Pais_viajo_1_cod as string,
		Pais_viajo_1_nom as string,
		Recuperado as string,
		Fecha_inicio_sintomas as string,
		Fecha_muerte as string,
		Fecha_diagnostico as string,
		Fecha_recuperado as string,
		Tipo_recuperacion as string,
		per_etn_ as string,
		nom_grupo_ as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> leemuestradatos
leemuestradatos alterRow(updateIf(Departamento == '11'),
	updateIf(Departamento_nom == 'BOGOTA'),
	updateIf(Departamento == '13001'),
	updateIf(Departamento_nom == 'CARTAGENA'),
	updateIf(Departamento == '8001'),
	updateIf(Departamento_nom == 'BARRANQUILLA'),
	updateIf(Departamento == '47001'),
	updateIf(Departamento_nom == 'STA MARTA D.E.')) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		fecha_hoy_casos as string,
		Caso as string,
		{Fecha Not} as string,
		Departamento as string,
		Departamento_nom as string,
		Ciudad_municipio as string,
		Ciudad_municipio_nom as string,
		Edad as string,
		unidad_medida as string,
		Sexo as string,
		Fuente_tipo_contagio as string,
		Ubicacion as string,
		Estado as string,
		Pais_viajo_1_cod as string,
		Pais_viajo_1_nom as string,
		Recuperado as string,
		Fecha_inicio_sintomas as string,
		Fecha_muerte as string,
		Fecha_diagnostico as string,
		Fecha_recuperado as string,
		Tipo_recuperacion as string,
		per_etn_ as string,
		nom_grupo_ as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['muestra_datos_salida'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> receptor1
